original_text: And this was why the Jews were persecuting Jesus, because he was doing these things on the Sabbath.
korean_text: 그러므로 안식일에 이러한 일을 행하신다 하여 유대인들이 예수를 박해하게 된지라

sentences.original_text: And this was why the Jews were persecuting Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 유대인들이 예수를 핍박하던 이유는 이것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: because he was doing these things on the Sabbath.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 안식일에 이런 일들을 하고 있었기 때문입니다
